CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 3, 1957, pg. A1 reads: "Cooling Off - During a recent hot day, Courier photographer Charles (Teenie) Harris took a picture of these youngsters cooling off in 2200 block of Bedford Ave. They came out from under the refreshing spray of water only long enough to identify themselves as Carolyn and Donna Clark and Linda, Dianne and Marshall Neason."
TitMainTitle: Marshall Neason aiming hose at Carolyn Clark, Donna Clark, and Linda Dianne Neason, while cleaning light colored Mercury car, 2200 block of Bedford Avenue with Macedonia Baptist Church in background, Hill District
